name: Laser Ninja (FlameShape)
description:
Description:
Since you were a little box you always wanted to be a ninja.
"Laser Ninja" is a game about helping Cubie to become a real ninja, by changing his color to match the pigment of the lasers. This way he can avoid detection.

Controls:
'A', 'D' or "ARROW KEYS" to move.
"SPACE", 'W' or "UP" to jump.
"LEFT / RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON" to change the player color.

Jam:
Made for trijam 71 in 5 hours.

Credits:

Font: "Vegur" by Sora Sagano.

Sound track: "Beat thee" by Alexander Nakarada.
